prod_desc: Stomp into action with the Range Trooper!
prod_long_desc:
Take on any adversary with this highly posable LEGO® Star Wars Range Trooper buildable figure. This powerful character from the blockbuster Han Solo movie features tough armor and ‘magnetic boot’ detailing, furry shoulder cloak and tunic, as well as a blaster weapon with spring-loaded shooter. Star Wars fans will love battling with this cool LEGO buildable figure.
Highly posable Range Trooper buildable figure features tough armor and ‘magnetic boot’ detailing, furry shoulder cloak and tunic, plus a blaster weapon with spring-loaded shooter.
Engage the enemy with the powerful spring-loaded shooter.
Move the limbs into any battle pose.
Sturdy and durable design for intense action play.
Play out exciting adventures from the Han Solo movie.
This buildable figure is suitable for ages 8-14.
Stands over 9” tall.
